sentences.en: " Now , I'll listen to music on my walkman. "
sentences.cn: 好 吧, 我要用我的随身听听听音乐.

sentences.en: A walkman can relieve the boredom of running.
sentences.cn: 跑步时带着随身听就不那么乏味了.

sentences.en: And you can use my Walkman.
During my time, a portable walkman would made my day.
sentences.cn: 我们那个年代, 便携式的随身听非常流行.

sentences.en: French kids are supposed to say balladeur instead of Walkman -- but they don't.
sentences.cn: 法国孩子该说balladeur(随身听)而不该说 walkman,但孩子们并不按要求做.

sentences.en: I like having a walk after dinner with my walkman.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢晚饭后戴着我的随身听散步.

sentences.en: I like music, and I like this walkman, too.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢音乐, 我也喜欢这个随身听.

sentences.en: I want to make some money and buy a walkman.
sentences.cn: 我想挣点钱买个随身听.

sentences.en: Many people ride to work, listening to a walkman.
sentences.cn: 很多人听着随身听,骑着车去上班.

sentences.en: Professor Walkman and other scientists are continuing their research.
sentences.cn: 沃特曼教授和其他的科学家还将继续他们的研究.

sentences.en: The multi - function Walkman can record and playback tapes by remote control.
sentences.cn: 一款多功能的随身听.通过遥控实现录音和回放磁带.

sentences.en: The Walkman Professional was developed with the ideal of sound quality.
sentences.cn: 作为专业随身听,为理想音质而诞生.

sentences.en: Those teenagers ripped off my walkman.
sentences.cn: 那些少年偷了我的随身听.

sentences.en: Until that moment, he had been happily listening to his walkman.
sentences.cn: 其实此前他一直快乐的听着随身听.

sentences.en: Walkman is fascinating because it isn't even English.
sentences.cn: Walkman(随身听)一词很有意思,因为它甚至不是英语词.

trans.tran_en: A Walkman is a small cassette player with headphones which people carry around so that they can listen to music, for example, while they are travelling
